chapters.title: Chapter 11: Talk of Debts
chapters.info: Lieutenant Rasoria Domanche, p. 287 (340)—Stocky underlieutenant in Elayne's palace guard. She looks with suspicion on everyone except Aviendha and Birgitte. She is from Tear, though she has blue eyes and yellow hair that she keeps cut short. She insists on watching the cooks make Elayne's meals and tasting everything first, to make sure it is safe for Elayne to eat.
